src:
Juicio político
Absolvieron al juez de paz de Bañado de Ovanta

01 Nov 2019, 05:00

El Tribunal de Enjuiciamiento absolvió al juez de Paz de Bañado de Ovanta (Santa Rosa) Ariel Guillermo Gómez, quien llegó acusado de haber intentado desalojar la casa que habita una mujer con sus hijos sin la debida orden judicial y de no registrar adecuadamente distintos trámites que se realizan en el Juzgado de Paz a su cargo.
Ayer se llevó a cabo una nueva jornada en la que se presentaron dos testigos. Un tercer testigo, que no se había presentado, y era considerado clave para el Tribunal tuvo que ser buscado por la fuerza pública.
Su testimonio fue clave, ya que negó que Gómez haya actuado de acuerdo a la denuncia. 
Tras su testimonio se dio paso a los alegatos en los que el fiscal Alejandro Dalla Lasta no mantuvo la acusación en contra del juez de Paz al entender que no se alcanzaron los elementos de prueba para solicitar su destitución, única pena que prevé el jury de enjuiciamiento, y consideró que las actuaciones por las presuntas irregularidades deberían ser giradas a la Sumarios de la Corte de Justicia para analizar un posible apercibimiento.
text:
Political judgment
The Justice of the Peace of Bañado de Ovanta was acquitted

01 Nov 2019, 05:00

The Prosecution Court acquitted the Justice of the Peace of Bañado de Ovanta (Santa Rosa) Ariel Guillermo Gómez, who arrived accused of having tried to evict the house that a woman lives with her children without due court order and of not properly registering different procedures that they are carried out in the Peace Court in your charge.
Yesterday a new day was held in which two witnesses appeared. A third witness, who had not appeared, and was considered key to the Court had to be sought by the public force.
His testimony was key, since he denied that Gomez acted according to the complaint.
After his testimony, the allegations were made in which the prosecutor Alejandro Dalla Lasta did not maintain the accusation against the Justice of the Peace when he understood that the evidence was not reached to request his dismissal, the only penalty provided by the trial jury , and considered that the proceedings for the alleged irregularities should be turned to the Summaries of the Court of Justice to analyze a possible warning.
